metadata.description: AI image and video generation prompts for Tvaraa Organics website

widescreen_banners.name: Widescreen Banners & Heroes
widescreen_banners.description: Use these for your large hero sections and page banners

home_hero.prompt: Widescreen cinematic shot of premium organic skincare and herbal cosmetic products featuring fresh natural ingredients like sliced aloe vera, dried turmeric, and colorful flowers. Set on a pristine, clean marble background with soft, diffused sunlight. Photorealistic, 4K, high-detail texture. --ar 16:9

about_us.prompt: Widescreen view of a modern, bright herbal research lab. A wooden workbench holds eco-friendly cosmetic samples, glass beakers, and test tubes. Clean, state-of-the-art environment. Photorealistic. --ar 16:9

services.prompt: Elegant, widescreen display of a variety of natural cosmetic jars and amber glass bottles arranged artfully on a light wooden slab, against a blurred, lush green herbal background. Soft, studio lighting. --ar 16:9

contract_manufacturing.prompt: Widescreen shot of an automated factory production line, focusing on herbal cosmetic packaging. Stainless steel machinery, clean environment, subtle natural light, a green, modern theme. --ar 16:9

private_label.prompt: Widescreen, luxury display of minimalist white private label cosmetic packaging mockups (jars, bottles, boxes) arranged perfectly. Focus on eco-friendly paper textures and a high-end, clean aesthetic. --ar 16:9

third_party_manufacturing.prompt: Widescreen view of a clean, modern herbal cosmetics factory floor with advanced stainless steel manufacturing equipment. Focus on scale, cleanliness, and professionalism. --ar 16:9

rd_formulation.prompt: Widescreen, dynamic shot of scientists in clean white lab coats carefully mixing herbal extracts in clear glass beakers in a modern laboratory setting. Focus on precision and innovation. --ar 16:9

packaging_solutions.prompt: Widescreen scene of an eco-friendly packaging line with biodegradable cardboard boxes and recyclable glass cosmetic bottles. Focus on sustainable materials and automated process. --ar 16:9

regulatory_services.prompt: Widescreen photo of a professional office desk. Certification seals, compliance documents, and herbal product approvals are neatly laid out next to a stylish green plant. Focus on trust and detail. --ar 16:9

products_hero.prompt: Widescreen flat lay of a diverse range of organic skincare, haircare, and wellness products with a scattering of fresh natural herbs and flowers. Bright, airy, and high-detail texture. --ar 16:9

process.prompt: Widescreen photo illustrating the step-by-step herbal cosmetic production line in an eco-friendly factory environment, from raw material to final packaged product. Clear and organized. --ar 16:9

contact_us.prompt: Widescreen, minimalist desk setup: a laptop, an organic cosmetic sample, a notebook, and a small potted green plant. Clean white desk, soft ambient light. --ar 16:9

get_quote.prompt: Widescreen, professional business meeting scene. Two people (diverse professionals) discussing over a wooden table, with herbal cosmetic samples and documents in the foreground. Clean, corporate, and trustworthy. --ar 16:9

faq.prompt: Widescreen, highly minimalist and conceptual image of a question mark subtly formed or outlined by delicate green leaves or vines. Clean white background. --ar 16:9

about_us_team.prompt: Group of diverse professionals in clean white lab coats and hairnets, collaborating and working on natural cosmetic formulations with various herbs and essential oils in a modern lab. Focus on teamwork and expertise. --ar 3:2

private_label_mockup.prompt: High-quality close-up of a range of minimalist white cosmetic jars and bottles. They are clean and blank, ready for branding. Perfect lighting, focus on texture and shape for a professional mockup. --ar 3:2

rd_ingredients.prompt: Extreme close-up, high-detail shot of various vibrant herbal ingredients—tulsi, dried neem leaves, and rich red hibiscus flowers—neatly displayed in clean, labeled glass containers. Focus on purity and color. --ar 3:2

packaging_materials.prompt: Close-up, detailed shot of eco-friendly, recyclable cosmetic jars and clear glass dropper bottles on a textured recycled cardboard surface. Focus on sustainable material quality and texture. --ar 3:2

contact_us_map.prompt: Stylized, high-design illustration of a simple map of India with a clean, light green eco-branding overlay. Minimalist, modern vector style, white background. --ar 3:2

square_images.name: Square Images
square_images.description: Standard square ratio for product categories, product grids, and service icons

skincare.prompt: Close-up flat lay of minimalist white organic skincare product jars and bottles (serum, cream) with visible raw herbs like chamomile and rose petals. Clean, bright, natural light. Square crop. --ar 1:1

haircare.prompt: Studio shot of herbal shampoo and conditioner bottles (green/amber glass) next to fresh botanicals like hibiscus flowers and neem leaves. Focus on a rich, natural green and brown color palette. Square crop. --ar 1:1

supplements.prompt: Close-up of clear capsules and herbal powder in a glass container on a wooden surface, surrounded by medicinal herbs like ashwagandha and turmeric root. Focus on wellness and purity. Square crop. --ar 1:1

baby_care.prompt: Soft, gentle image of white, minimalist baby care product tubes next to a small, fluffy cotton cloth and lavender sprigs. Pale, soft lighting, focus on safety and tenderness. Square crop. --ar 1:1

personal_care.prompt: Elegant display of luxury herbal body wash and handcrafted soap bars with essential oils. Clean background, soft shadowing, high-end, premium aesthetic. Square crop. --ar 1:1

aromatherapy.prompt: Stylized photo of a clean essential oil diffuser, small amber dropper bottles, and dried lavender/eucalyptus on a wooden shelf. Warm, relaxing light. Square crop. --ar 1:1

contract_manufacturing.prompt: Minimalist vector icon of an automated production line or conveyor belt leading to a finished product box. Clean, green and white color palette, isolated on a white background. --ar 1:1

private_label.prompt: Minimalist vector icon of a blank cosmetic jar being overlaid with a simple logo or stamp icon. Conceptual, focus on branding. Clean, green and white color palette. --ar 1:1

third_party_manufacturing.prompt: Minimalist vector icon of a large factory building with smoke stacks emitting clean, green leaves instead of smoke. Conceptual, focus on eco-friendly scale. Clean, green and white color palette. --ar 1:1

rd_formulation.prompt: Minimalist vector icon of a test tube or beaker holding a green liquid with a magnifying glass hovering over it. Focus on science and herbs. Clean, green and white color palette. --ar 1:1

packaging_solutions.prompt: Minimalist vector icon of a cardboard box being sealed, surrounded by various eco-friendly packaging materials (glass bottle, paper tube). Focus on sustainability. Clean, green and white color palette. --ar 1:1

regulatory_services.prompt: Minimalist vector icon of a formal document or checklist with a large approval checkmark, styled with a small sprig of green leaves. Focus on compliance. Clean, green and white color palette. --ar 1:1

client_logos.prompt: Minimalist monochrome brand logo mockups placed on a subtle white textured paper. Vector style, thin lines, transparent background concept. --ar 2:1

videos.name: Videos
videos.description: Use these prompts in an AI video generation tool (like RunwayML)

homepage_hero_video.prompt: Cinematic, ultra slow-motion 10-second seamless loop of herbal ingredients (rosemary, aloe) falling into a glass beaker, followed by a cosmetic emulsion being poured into an amber glass bottle. Natural, diffused light, luxury aesthetic. 4K quality, ProRes color grading. --ar 16:9

process_video.prompt: 30-second animated sequence illustrating the organic cosmetic process: 1. R&D (lab scene). 2. Formulation (mixing). 3. Automated packaging (bottles on a line). 4. Final packaged product (beautiful display). Use clean, motion graphics style with a green and white theme. Continuous, professional flow. 4K quality. --ar 16:9
